Posts.Content: Congratulations! Good to hear your tests were negative! Joyce
Posts.Title: Has This Happened to Anyone Else

Posts.Content: I would talk with your Mother and have her call the Doc and get a mammogram and/or a sonogram. This will tell you if there is anything to worry about. It will ease your mind. Beg them, this will drive you to unneeded stress. Cancer can strike anyone, no matter what age.
Posts.Title: Hello

Posts.Content: I had a mastectomy in May, 2003. 2005 found another lump in front of armpit, same side. Cancer, but only could be detected by the sonagram. Mammogram didn't show anything at all. Now have in other side & in lymph nodes. I would ask for a PET-CT scan, two in one scan. This shows ALL hot spots they consider cancer. This is just to be sure. Luck & good wishes, Joyce
Posts.Title: Has This Happened to Anyone Else
